supporting

is customers
can use a very simple tool called
click
to
containerize now click to containerize
is an add-on module it is part of db2 so
if you are running db2 server or if

of db2 click to containerize is already
inside db2 it's tool that you just need
to utilize click for containerize
connects back to a source database so
you would currently connect it to your
on-premises or wherever your Source

containerize and you create a Target
that Target could be a ec2 instance if

shift click to containerize can connect

actually build out the underlying

click to containerize can migrate a
click to containerize can deal with a

it can be utilized for online

or if I'm in say a public sector context

settings
